lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Drive a forklift and load fuel onto trucks

lender.name: ilbusca
lender.loan_because: I don't know.
lender.occupational_info: I can design a mechanical component and then take a nice photo of it.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It took me 49 years of sometimes serious struggle to reach my goal. Now i want to help others reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I produce store and pack 230 ha of apples along the southern shore of Lake Ontario near Niagara Falls.

lender.name: Mikkel
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I want to help others feel good about themselves. Being able to pay back a loan gives you a great self confidence.
lender.occupational_info: Helping other businesses focus on their core skills and outsource non core activities to my employer.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: Anybody who is full of good intentions has to have the chance to improve his life with no additional fees.
lender.occupational_info: I make some boxes do their work properly.

lender.name: Susan & Natalie Clarke
lender.loan_because: We care about others.
lender.occupational_info: We're elementary school students

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to 31 countries and I understand the need for projects like this. In my life I have been lucky, and want to give back to the people that are like the people I have met in my travels. Hard working entrepreneurs that seek the same opportunities that I am fortunate enough to have.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the financial system , commonly known as Wall Street. The people I work with are far removed from projects like this, but if more knew about it I think could make a meaningful difference to the global community. I choose to make this a part of my work.

lender.name: Jim & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We are always looking for ways to help with what God has blessed us with. Kiva has provided the opportunity to connect with people around the world in an uplifting way. Thanks Kiva
lender.occupational_info: Christian work with our local church.

lender.name: Elisabete Miranda
lender.loan_because: I believe that a small amount of money can help a lot. I believe in people's capacities to make good things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I'm current a business analyst in a portuguese bank. I've worked 17 years with computers and I was a teacher at University.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: the cause is good and the need is great.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning how to describe the workings of the universe. I also love waffles.

lender.name: Mary & Doug Snyder
lender.loan_because: There is a need and, to quote Margaret Mead, "Never doubt that a group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." May these ladies, and those like us who provide loans make the changes that we all so desperately need.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a used record store and provide quality music of all kinds to many different types of folks. I also work at Yale University as a financial assistant.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky and blessed and would like to help someone else achieve their dreams and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of three children-2 boys (ages 14 and 8) and 1 girl (age 12). I work at SarahCare part time, and do data entry work nights and weekends. I want to spend as much time with my children as possible while still bringing in extra income. I have an elementary education degree which I may use again one day.

lender.name: Zerrin
lender.loan_because: I believe that the greatest gift you can recieve is the ability to give

lender.name: Fondation Esther B.
lender.loan_because: We would like to help our clients who live with HIV/AIDS to set up small firm.
lender.occupational_info: Esther Boucicault Stanislas is the firts lady in Haiti who declared her seropositivity in radio station and television.She created " The Fondation Esther B. Stanislas" , at Saint Marc Haiti,since 1996.We are working in the field of the Psychosociale Assistance,Medicale Assistance and nutritional support with people living with the HIV / AIDS. After traitment and psychosocial assistance,those PVVIH's are doing better,they need to work and recover their dignity.

lender.name: Nuala
lender.loan_because: I think my small contribution can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I managing a group of people in a call center who sell lift tickets and season passes for a ski resort in the mountains of Colorado

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me
lender.occupational_info: Not very important

lender.name: Justus
lender.loan_because: Everybody should do it
lender.occupational_info: I'm still a student, but aside I love to be a creative entrepreneur. I have my own creative agency. I work together with different partners all over the world, with one goal: inspire people

lender.name: Shereef
lender.loan_because: it enables people to improve their own quality of life in a dignified, ambitious and sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting lenders with entrepreneurs to alleviate poverty in northern Peru

lender.name: Federico
lender.loan_because: I think micro economy is a sustainable way to improve society
lender.occupational_info: I design automatic machines, but I like other things too :)

lender.name: Riju
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Megan & Erik
lender.loan_because: In a world full of social injustices, we want to do whatever possible as human beings to make a difference in someone's life. Howard Zinn delivers a challenge when he says, ''To be neutral and to be passive is to collaborate with whatever is going on.'' Democracy he defines as ''not just a counting-up of votes'' but a ''counting-up of actions.''
lender.occupational_info: As social studies teachers, we work to bring knowledge and understanding to our students in the areas of history, politics, government and geography.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to see how people around the world are improving their lives and satisfying to feel I can be a part of it.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: alleviating poverty is beneficial to all of mankind.
lender.occupational_info: I help connect Kiva lenders to Kiva borrowers by creating the journal updates that you read if you lend to a SEDA borrower.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I teach Human Geography to children that are 11-13 years old. We learn about people and places all over the world. We just finished studying South Africa, India and Mexico. I love to watch the students light up as they learn about new parts of their ever changing world.

lender.name: Lis
lender.loan_because: regardless of one's personal trials we are all connected as brothers and sisters and deserve the opportunity to better our lives. I am thankful to be able to lend and share with people who have the courage and strength to ask for support. Thank you Zach for the wonderful gift you gave me so I might share it with others! May those whose lives we touch be as spiritually blessed and filled with a loving light as I have been. In peace, Lis
lender.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to caption for people who are challenged (deaf, hard of hearing, low vision, etc) in schools, colleges, conferences, and workshops.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: You derserve it!

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: businesses need capital to grow.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: When so little can change someone's life so much, how can I not get invloved!
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers by day and drive my two busy teenagers from place to place at night.

lender.name: Lissa
lender.loan_because: It's the smart, just, compassionate, and plain old right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I bring healing to people through the use of sound and music.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It is amazing to see people actually recieving your money and making their lives better through it!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a four-year university in the United States, and am studying to be an Elementary School teacher

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because:
A lot of government aid ends up in dubious projects run by big multinational companies.
I use this table as part of my loan selection criteria: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiva_(organization)#Interest_rates_2

lender.name: Johnson's
lender.loan_because: Small Business owner ourselves and we love to help

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help people around the world and to make sure that the help goes to the people that need it.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: When I see that someone is trying to make their life better, I want to help. I like to loan to people that already have a business going and are trying to improve it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes cleaning equipment. My job is mostly with computers and helping the other people I work with to use them.

lender.name: Remco
lender.loan_because: it is impressive how kiva connects you to local entrepreneurs

lender.name: Gerra
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to make a difference in someone's life and to help impoverished nations grow.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college science majors how to write better.

lender.name: Elad
lender.loan_because: I learned a saying in my life, "Sharing is caring". I try to follow it every day.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: I'm an independent entrepreneur type of person myself and want to support people who just need a bit of a leg up to start their own businesses. I am so lucky to live in Canada. Even a seemingly small amount of money (to us) can be a huge amount to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for myself doing jewelry design, graphic design, and photography.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed, and all people need is a chance. We become more compassionate when we help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a performer--I sing opera, and spend much of my life onstage in crazy costumes making a lot of sound!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: When I was a fundraiser I always loved grassroots efforts and Kiva is a champion grassroots initiative - inspiring and effective
lender.occupational_info: I was a full time mom, then a teacher, then a fundraiser and now I run a website where families and organizations make personalized cookbooks with pictures, recipes and stories

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Someone once loaned to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer at the burn unit at Brooke Army Medical Center in San Antonio Texas.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: it gives me great pleasure to know that what I give can help someone run their own business, add value to society, and make needed money for their families.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to do something that I know will make a difference in fighting poverty. I also believe in "teaching a man to fish," so microloans are the perfect fit.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning to use a shorthand machine to take down what people say in court.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: Loans are more useful and motivating than charities, and it is a good way to bypass governments, maintaining contact with entrepreneurs at the same time.

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: Why not you can't take it with you. To helps others out. God has blessed me now I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Life is what you make it so why not make it fun. GO PACK GO

lender.name: Kelly Westphall
lender.occupational_info: I am a rancher who works HARD everyday to try to make a better place and mindset for my daughter. My husband and I raise cattle, pigs, chickens, and we also grow fruit trees and save seeds for our own garden. We try to barter almost everything because we don't have the money to buy, but to us that doesn't matter, as long as we can help others and live on just necceseties we are VERY happy.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because:
The smallest good deed is better than the grandest good intention. - Duguet
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. - Aesop
lender.occupational_info: Account Executive.

lender.name: Adriaan
lender.loan_because: if you have any extra income you should give it to someone who needs it much more that you. Helping a person get back on their feet or giving them the hope that they can continue on in their endeavor is much more valuable than anything you could buy for yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at Oberlin College in Ohio.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: i believe we can all make a difference, one person at a time...

lender.name: DaNelle
lender.loan_because: I want the dreams of the creative people in this world to be realized.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the energy efficiency program for low income residents of the city of Phoenix.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I hope that this will enable others to enjoy their life and improve their family circumstances
lender.occupational_info: I work with other businesses to teach them how to improve what they do.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Florapathics supports endeavors that empower people to make positive changes in their lives and the world around them. We donate to Kiva.org directly as well as funding loans to assist program participants.
lender.occupational_info: Florapathics is an all-natural aromatherapy and body care company. We use the highest quality aromatic botanicals from all over the world to create our unique scents and product offerings.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupational_info: Market Research for Warner Bros. Pictures

lender.name: Hoan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping others

lender.name: Chicago Golds
lender.occupation: Team of Law, Telecom & 3 Great Kids
lender.loan_because: For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can and because I firmly believe that business is the key to creating greater wealth rather than simple charity.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with an income (even though minimal) and I like to share it with others, as I believe it can make a big impact in this world. I always have all my needs met, I share my money to help others have their needs met.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher with young children. I work caring for children with single mothers, while their mothers work.

lender.name: Ashleigh
lender.loan_because: There should be no more 'have-nots.'
lender.occupational_info: I am in school for a degree in International Development.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: A good friend gave us a gift certificate allowing us to experience the satisfaction of providing a loan to someone who can improve their standard of living as a result.
lender.occupational_info: Product Manager Telecom Industry

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps...
lender.occupational_info: In the workplace, I help people when they have problems and I also help them achieve goals.

lender.name: Cindy Diamond
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur. I realize we don't get anywhere in life without others. I just want to make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a third generation chocolatier and own the family business.

lender.name: Joe Ross
lender.loan_because: What a Super way to help the World !! I have been very blessed and this is a great way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entreprenuer also. I know the value of being able to borrow to expand or start-up a business.

lender.name: The Nienows
lender.loan_because: We are excited about finding a simple, direct way to respond to the compassion God has placed on our hearts.

lender.name: syawal
lender.loan_because: settle personal debt.
lender.occupational_info: freelancer.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I could have never made it to where I am in my life without a little help along the way. I am just returning the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare culinary dishes for patrons at the restaurant where I work.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: economic opportunity is the pathway to social justice and a sustainable world for all of us. And because I am a mother and wish that all children had the opportunities my son does.
lender.occupational_info: I am a political activist; I work to change my community and make it a fairer and kinder place, particularly for lesbians and gay men.

lender.name: sasha
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place...
lender.occupational_info: High school student (10th grade)

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and I believe God calls us to give. It truly benefits the world.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like to help out where I can because I feel that I am very fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I design cabinetry for kitchens and bathrooms.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good job and a good education, and this is a brilliant, empowering and viable way of passing on a little extra to hard-working people who need it.

lender.name: Doug
lender.occupation: Consultant - I am on the right w/ a client
lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO MAKE THEIR WORLD A BETTER PLACE THROUGH BUSINESS OWNERSHIP AND SERVING THE NEEDS OF THEIR COMMUNITY DESERVE A HELPING HAND TO GET STARTED AND BE SUCCESSFUL.
lender.occupational_info: I AM A BUSINESS CONSULTANT WHO HELPS COMPANIES OF ALL SIZES BECOME MORE PROFITABLE AND PRODUCTIVE. I FOUNDED MY OWN BUSINESS 12 YEARS AGO, AND WHILE SOME YEARS ARE GREAT AND SOME ARE TOUGH, I BELIEVE THAT STARTING YOUR OWN BUSINESS IS THE BEST WAY TO EMPOWER YOURSELF AND HELP YOUR COMMUNITY.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: a little bit can make an enormous difference.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help individuals and small businesses by creating beautiful, easy-to-navigate, web sites.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It's a way to share my limited good fortune and to support the dreams and hard work of others. I have a special affinity in supporting those pursuing a career in the arts.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the quality and reliability of software by way of testing techniques and improvement of processes.

lender.name: SON
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Making the world a better place.

lender.name: Rob Banga
lender.loan_because: I've seen the devastation that the inescapable cycle of poverty can have on individuals. I believe strategically placed capital can have a very positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people at a software company.

lender.name: wadhwani
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: I do nothing.

lender.name: Winnie
lender.loan_because: I know how it is like to be given an opportunity, and I hope to give back by contributing to someone else's opportunity. :)
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, identities and printed collaterals for a living. Would love to travel and work at the same time, one day.

lender.name: mette
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people with small amounts that means a lot to them and very little for me.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disabled young people,to help them them get a better quality of life.So they can join aktivity`s when they are not at work at places that are arranged for their handicap.Such as disco,swimming,keep their flat tidy,get dressed,and whatever they need assistance to manage.It is a job that gives me very much back.I feel Ido something very useful,and still gives me a lot of challenge,whichI like in my job!

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: Planning software systems and websites.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.occupation: Adventure Nature and Culture tourist guide
lender.loan_because: I am a Sri Lankan tourist guide who doing tours in central mountain region of the cuntry. I want to get the web site domain name srilankatrekking.com This domain name is a famas one in tourist guide books. But now it is taken by a domin name collector in America. I try to pay him 100$. What he agreed. But I could not do that. But the owner Mr carlos given me the domain name server to me. please check srilankatrekking.com Now I want him to pay that money 100$.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing a interesting but seasonal job. A tourist guide who doing adventure mountain trekking in beautiful Knuckles mountain range in central Sri Lanka and Other natural and cultural placess in all Sri Lanka

lender.name: Melita
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to have seen and experienced some amazing things. During my travels I have been welcomed by those with very limited resources. Now I have found a great platform to give back...
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of a beautiful 7 year old boy. My job is to nuture this young child into grown man but I hear it won't stop there!

lender.name: andre
lender.loan_because: I like to support the work people untertake to improve their life.

lender.name: NBC Wildcats
lender.loan_because: This is our chance to sacrifice a little to make a huge difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in a 7th grade world geography class located in Western Michigan.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: "We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop." -Mother Theresa
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace materials / test engineer.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much in this world, and others deserve the same opportunities as me.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students attain their educational goals.

lender.name: Jonathan Cross
lender.loan_because:
I have traveled a lot in Asia & Eastern Europe and found immense generosity everywhere. I was often frustrated in my attempts to "help" those disadvantaged by the current economic system and was looking for a constructive way return the generosity. Giving away money directly to people doesn't work and I am skeptical of large, western NGOs.
Kiva was a "no-brainer" for me. In this economy, this is the only investment which guaranteed a positive return!
lender.occupational_info: I make web pages for Google, volunteer when possible and have spent almost 6 years "on the road" exploring this beautiful earth.

lender.name: steve p
lender.loan_because: Because I have been blessed in my life so much and the greatest expression of my gratitude is to bless others
lender.occupational_info: I work in the restaurant business feeding adn servicing guests

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Organizing and mobilizing a denomination of churches who's mission is to change the world.

lender.name: Carson
lender.loan_because: The feeling of building something yourself is incredibly gratifying and empowering. I've been fortunate enough to enjoy both the experience and the fruits of it. I enjoy helping others do the same.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: we each can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to fly!

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: We've worked hard to become successful in our own small business & we hope to help someone else less fortunate do the same. We believe in supporting those who want to make their lives better by hard work & sacrifice. Our lives have been blessed in many ways and we hope that our involvement in Kiva helps us pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small dental office.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I realized that for the price of a movie and a pizza, I could make a difference in someone's life. I am grateful for this opportunity to help those with less.

lender.name: Marquis
lender.loan_because: Love giving that push to energized entrepreneurs which can lead them to success!!!
lender.occupational_info: I help to make creative ideas a reality. I also assist in steering the Federal Government in successfully taking advantage of electronic communication.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I research things we might expect to see in the future (usually in 10-20 years)

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: James
lender.occupation: Executive Director of Plug In Carolina
lender.loan_because: Capitalism needs capital to work. I loan to Kiva because of its accountable track record of success.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: Productivity is not a relative term, unlike wealth; the more productive people are in the world, the better off we all will be.
lender.occupational_info: I prevent disease by studying both disease organisms and related organisms.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
Investments, rather than handouts, are the basis for real economic progress. Social and technological progress are natural corollaries to this.
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I can and this is a very direct way to make a long lasting impact.

lender.name: Pippa
lender.loan_because: im happy to help out
lender.occupational_info: self diciplined, home based,creative

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because:
I am a firm believer in "Do unto others as you would have others do unto you." I do not enjoy purchasing goods knowing that they were probably made at the expense of someone else.
I am also a small business operator, who is lucky enough to not have been born into poverty, with access to greater financial services.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own small retail store. I try to specialize in products and services that both entertain and engage our youth.

lender.name: Bruce & Joy
lender.occupation: Bruce: Group Life Underwriter Joy: Artist
lender.occupational_info:
Bruce: If your employer provides you with life insurance, I determine how much you should get and what it would cost.
Joy: I make beautiful things out of discarded materials.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to make their lives better.

lender.name: Gabriel Fuzat
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people of all ages to reach their fitness or performance goals. Whether they want to get fitter, faster or stronger, I will make them achieve their goals!

lender.name: Catherine T
lender.loan_because: I am at a point in my life where I am able to take care of myself and now am also fortunate enough to have the means to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Assist with anything and everything President/CEO of the company needs. Ranges from planning events to drafting documents to being a sounding board.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: People need to support people

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I like that I can actually help.
lender.occupational_info: I find contruction subcontractors (like carpenters and plumbers) and bring them together to build stores, office buildings and hotels.

lender.name: John & Patty
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed...

lender.name: PS 150 Givers
lender.loan_because: We want to help out and make a difference.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: What an exciting way to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement computer and automation systems.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I sell cigars in a retail shop.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to be able to support themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Im a pharmacist in profession but currently a premed student, and in the process of my application to podiatric medical school.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think our world needs to change, and we are the people who can change it. I really like the idea of micro-loans, so it's a cool way to make a little difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer programmer in a local clothing business.

lender.name: Woodfield School
lender.loan_because: We are a tutor class at Woodfield School in London, UK. We loan so we can see how our money helps people across the world to improve their lives and education.
lender.occupational_info: We are pupils in Year 9 and we use Kiva to help us to learn about life in other countries, whilst we help them to improve their lives.

lender.name: ProsperingWoman
lender.loan_because: I believe in self-determination.

lender.name: Monica&Dave
lender.loan_because: this is an excellent way of giving a hand to those who are working hard to make a living under circumstances so much more difficult than ours.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: It's one way to do our global duty.
lender.occupational_info: Scientific research.

lender.name: Juan Carlos
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs have a social responsibility to prove what industrialization failed to do so: the only way out of poverty is not by getting larger & bigger but by reaching out the farthest, serving those unfortunate that belong at that "long tail" of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people/companies with their financial situation, either by pointing them in the right direction or by encouraging them to take matters in their own hands.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave my a gift card for my Conformation, and this website definitly caught my interest.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I know the money loaned will make a difference in someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Telecommunications company supporting Government accounts in California.

lender.name: Robert and Josh
lender.loan_because: Oprah said to. That's also why we buy cage free eggs, and don't text while we drive.
lender.occupational_info: Artistic

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: That's how my mama raised me. (Hi, Mom!)

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to encourage growth and self starting where it is a challenge.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the internal information infrastructure, intranet and external website for a replacement window and vinyl siding manufacturer.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: i am an entrepreneur myself and have been blessed with success. now i want to give back and help others succeed as well.
lender.occupational_info: i am a graphic designer, and i help companies understand how to use the internet to make their business better.

lender.name: Geno
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I own a couple of TV stations and get to travel the world to bring back stories of what these places and people are really like. I have the greatest job.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I realize that I'm very blessed with all that I have and I want others to feel the same way
lender.occupational_info: I go to class Monday through Friday at the University of Texas in Austin, Texas.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: You can only change the world by changing one person's world at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Photographing life, writing wrongs, helping people help people.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I beleive in paying it forward..."In the order of nature we cannot render benefits to those from whom we receive them, or only seldom. But the benefit we receive must be rendered again, line for line, deed for deed, cent for cent, to somebody."
lender.occupational_info: I work a transportation district

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I respect people trying to improve their lives, and want to help them do it!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Denver.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I think people just need a hand up sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand one another.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed my life in many ways. I want to help others who are in need. Those who have should help those who have not.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Herbalife Distributor and love to help people with their health and wellness goals! I also teach children with disabilities part-time.

lender.name: Ivar Mykland
lender.loan_because: There are no excuses not to

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like to help out where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for a travel company in Australia.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I love helping others in any way I can.

lender.name: TravelDude
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others that are less fortunate than I am around the world, and it make me feel good knowing I'm making a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I travel around the world for a living.

lender.name: Emily and Evans
lender.loan_because: we want to share our love with our global neighbors by providing them with substantive support.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I own a software development business specializing in building innovative web based solutions to such as www.tooeasy.com.au using the opensource www.DotNetNuke.com platform.

lender.name: Joel, Kai, Henry & Ben
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of investing and being charitable at the same time. We have also read some interesting articles on microfinance, and we have friends who are Kiva members.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an attorney / claims adjuster for an insurance company.
My wife (Kai) is an attorney / lobbyist working on behalf of physicians.
Henry (6) and Ben (2) are our sons.

lender.name: Alina
lender.loan_because: this is therapy shopping that really helps!

lender.name: Black Steve
lender.loan_because: credit is the foundation of trade, which, in turn, is the foundation of civilization. Really.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: I want to share the little things that I have and make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office of the same school I attend.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to empower others to become self-sufficient. Loaning is like giving a hand up instead of a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer for the City of Chicago Department of Law. I litigate state and local tax cases.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Getting product to the corners of the globe.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I've seen in vulnerable communities in India how desperation can force individuals to rely on unscrupulous moneylenders and the damage this can cause. Human bondage and suffering can easily be avoided by this sort of microcredit
lender.occupational_info: I'm a young but enthusiastic development worker who has spent time with UN agencies, local NGOs and international NGOs in India, Nepal and Ecuador

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: As an American I want to undo some of the damage my country has caused the poor people of the world.

lender.name: Hidanovic Family
lender.loan_because: Such small loans can give people significant power to change their lives. It's the right thing to do, and we're able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: We also do work that requires the participation of investors. Taking charge of one's own life and working hard to grow one's own business is a big and fulfilling job. We're with you on that!

lender.name: Enum K.T.
lender.loan_because: where I live, pennies fall from the sky. A very strange place Mexico is.
lender.occupational_info: You can find me at a sidewalk cafe, sipping espresso maquiato while watching people walk by and thinking about the nature of things.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I believe in what Kiva is doing and I'm able to.
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of people's pet cats and dogs. And I'm studying speech communication.

lender.name: Scott and Cecile
lender.loan_because: We're trying to teach our kids the importance of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Scott owns a business that cleans offices, warehouses, and schools. He used to practice law. Cecile does educational testing for chldren that are struggling in school.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: BANKS ARE HOPELESS WHEN IT COMES TO ENTREPENEURS
lender.occupational_info: Advisor, mentor, entrepeneur, geek

lender.name: Claudia
lender.occupational_info: social media, blogging, community management, public relations

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: it is something I can do. I could donate money, but I believe in helping people help themselves and this is just one way to accomplish that. Plus, I can choose borrowers in Cambodia, a country I recently visited and fell in love with.
lender.occupational_info: Currently looking.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: God loved us first.

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I would rather people use the money on something good then the money sit in a bank.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am just a university student at the moment, but once I graduate I hope to work on making the internet more accessible to everyone.

lender.name: J. Jeronimo
lender.loan_because: just because

lender.name: Nicoletta
lender.loan_because: It' s a human thing, I think.

lender.name: SELESTINE
lender.occupation: Gender, HIV/AIDS and Human Rights Advocate

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to try and help out others in any way that you can. I've joined Kiva.org because it empowers those who have political and systematic financial obstacles to gain a better livelihood for themselves, their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at university. I also work in a restaurant during evenings and weekends to pay for living expenses.

lender.name: Dinar Andriyana
lender.loan_because: my reason to borrow money is for get more money to buy goods for sell

lender.name: VIPS
lender.occupation: Designs and markets Bags and purses

lender.name: Blake
lender.occupation: Field Organizer for the Barack Obama Campaian
lender.loan_because: I believe in a world where the "golden rule" still exists.
lender.occupational_info: I organize volunteers for a political campaign.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: We need to take care of one another. It's simply how a civilized world behaves.
lender.occupational_info: I place advertising on TV, Newspapers, radio and internet for my company.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of fourth grade students, ages 9-10.

lender.name: Thelma
lender.loan_because: I just want to help

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.occupational_info: My work is thoroughly unpredictable and more fun than a barrel of monkeys.

lender.name: bryan
lender.loan_because: To help people reach their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair computer systems

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: Telephone Repairman

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I wanted to show my macroeconomics class (Economics 202) what they can do to help people in developing countries. The class voted to determine who they wanted to sponsor. Each semester, whoever gets the most votes from the class receives a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a college in North Dakota, instructing a variety of social science courses in history, economics, and sociology.

lender.name: Shabbir
lender.loan_because: The income difference between my country and donation countries means I can make a difference though I'm not a wealthy philanthropist.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: "be the change you wish to see in the world" "actions speak louder than words".. and all that jazz.

lender.name: Lucie
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Selbe's English
lender.loan_because: Class wants to help others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Currently unemployed, I'm putting in a vegetable garden, writing a book, and recording some music.

lender.name: Matt & Joanna
lender.loan_because: We believe that microfinance works!

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: I am a strong supporter of those wishing to work to better themselves and their families. Giving back in a way like this is the least I can do for the world.

lender.name: Sonjia
lender.loan_because: I can, and it feels good to be able to help someone achieve their dream.

lender.name: Arizal
lender.loan_because: I would like to pay to the University and support life of my family
lender.occupational_info: In the morning I study at the University and in the afternoon I work as a farmer in the rice field

lender.name: Lynne & Dylan
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to give back to the countries I love to travel to. I also want to honor my son by helping people in his birth country. Giving to women helps them keep their families together and their children in school to empower the community as a whole.
lender.occupational_info: I test software to make sure it works efficiently for those who need to use it.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses find ways to grow and prosper, and I help local governments figure out ways to help small businesses.

lender.name: Linda Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back and giving back makes me happy!
lender.occupational_info: Busy

lender.name: Alozie
lender.loan_because: i want to support my business and also startup another business.
lender.occupational_info: installation fo tyre sealant in car tyres against puntures and bullet.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I love having this opportunity and everyone can give a little.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who need to learn basic skills and English as a Second Language.

lender.name: Ella Suenos
lender.loan_because: we are all in this life together. I am happy that I am able to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I love to paint with oil paints. And I love using my hands and imagination to create interesting, inspirational and hopefully, beautiful surroundings.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can and it's a good thing to do...

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I understand that I am richer than most of the world's population. I think there is a responsibility associated with that blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I dye fiber which is sold to spinners, through the yarn store that I work at.

lender.name: Melissa Dawn
lender.loan_because: I shall pass through this world but once. Any good therefore that I can do let me do it now. Let me not defer or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again. ~~~~~~~ Not what I have, but what I do, is my kingdom. ~~~~~~~

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: it's a nice thing to do and u really help out people in need
lender.occupational_info: 5'6 brown skin low hair cut and is always FRSH

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: The tiny interest I receive on this money means less to me than to these entrepreneurs - so why not forego the interest and further development.
lender.occupational_info: I compete for cash prizes in bicycle races.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: "Another world is not only possible, she is coming. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing." Arundhati Roy

lender.name: Vibeke
lender.loan_because: I appreciate entrepreneurs of all trades and colours, however small.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: The only way to become rich yourself, is to enrich others.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed and I want to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults in learning more about their faith.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Hope
lender.occupational_info: Retired Soldier / Student

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give a hand up
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults who need English at work.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have all that I need and much more. I believe it is my responsibility to assist those who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student. I am working toward my master's degree in school counseling.

lender.name: Bev & Dave
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives. We live in Canada, one of the greatest countries on earth, and can, and should do more, for our brothers and sisters on this planet, so that they know they are not alone in wanting to improve conditions for their families and their countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am trained as a teacher but also worked as a Secretary. My husband was manager of a university bookstore for 36 years. Through the Coady Institute in Antigonish, Nova Scotia, people from third world countries come to train in the cooperative movement started here in Nova Scotia, by Dr. Moses Coady. They then take those skills back to their towns and villages to teach and help their people improve their standards of living.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I feel that we all need to help each other out in this world. Being able to help someone reach a goal that they truly want to fulfill, especially when the person is a total stranger across the world, is awesome.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that people get paid for performing their jobs.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world. I use Kiva, because I have intense curiosity about where my money goes and love associating faces and stories with whatever small difference I can make.
lender.occupational_info: I write everything from news articles and human interest stories for newspapers, magazines, and websites, to corporate writing to sell products or generate traffic for websites.

lender.name: Indiabeau
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world by being the change
lender.occupational_info: I sail for work which is just heaven!!!

lender.name: Gilles
lender.loan_because: I like to help people get there own business to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Make love food. I find my work very exciting.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I love to feel like I may be making a differencein somone's life that may not have otherwise received the help. This is a fantastic program!
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing - I Market Cardiovascular equipment for the diagnosis and treatment of cardiac disorders.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower someone else

lender.name: Linda & Jim
lender.loan_because: we believe that this is a way to truly make a difference in people's lives around the world, helping them to help themselves.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to open the door to hard working people around the world who do not have the means to start their own business further lifting themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Tokopa
lender.loan_because: Sometimes small things can help. (In memory of an angel.)

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: It's easy, it feels good, it is a great thing to do. As a small business owner I enjoy supporting other small business entrepreneurs throughout the world. Reading the stories and seeing the aspirations of people is always inspiring. Kiva is a great way to be able to help people I would never meet, but are as deserving as anyone of having a good life. I feel more connected to others across the globe and more connected to life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Retired librarian and now a bed & breakfast owner

lender.name: Tim & Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Tim is retired from human resources. Lisa is a Speech Pathologist in a hospital. She works mostly with people who have had strokes or have Parkinson's. She helps people to improve their speech, communication, and swallowing.

lender.name: Grandma Mary
lender.loan_because: In honor of my grandchildren, who's father is from Nigeria. Viva Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have recently moved to his homeland, St. Vincent and the Grenadines. He is a photographer and I paint watercolor portraits. We help local business and other artist by promoting, framing and printing their artwork.

lender.name: Niki
lender.occupational_info: website design/front-end development

lender.name: E.D. Johnson
lender.loan_because:
But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
-1 John 3:17
lender.occupational_info: Professional Writer

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bonnie & Cliff
lender.loan_because: We love people and we are thankful for being so blessed. People have dreams and hope for a better life. What we can offer is a small way of giving a helping hand and will bring about great things. We are pleased to be part of this program.
lender.occupational_info:
Cliff owns several businesses. -------------------------------------------------- Bonnie works as a Flight Attendamt
NOTE: We have been blessed with seven sons and duaghters. They are all married and they have introduced and blessed us with 17 grandchildren. Ages range from newborn - age 8.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Small loans make a big difference.

lender.name: TO Designs
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a fantastic program. We're so proud of what they've done.
lender.occupational_info: We design logos, websites and collateral material. We focus on small businesses and start-ups.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and be active in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Charles & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We give to people making an effort to improve their life.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people fulfill their ambitions and dreams and create their independence and improve their communities in the process!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a cleanroom environment that is 1,000 times cleaner than an operating room. We have to wear bunny suits so we don't contaminate the tools/air. We make tiny state of the art computer chips. It's all magic to me!

lender.name: Tanuja & Izaak
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to. Everyone deserves the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Met in Ghana. Started a small nonprofit called Africa's Tomorrow to help needy students. Just doing what we can to make this world a better place for ALL of us.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of Literature.

lender.name: Kate and Todd
lender.occupational_info: Todd programs computers, Kate raises our son.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: This stuff is pretty fucking cool.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because: There are people less fortunate.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that have good ideas and are trying to improve their lives and others around them.

lender.name: Sameer
lender.loan_because: it makes perfect sense.
lender.occupational_info: I work on chips that go into hard drives used in PC's, laptops, servers and iPods

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I am a working mom and also have my own business with my husband. I want to help other women in business to reach their goals.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and others have helped me get started. It's my turn to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their health and fitness through my interactive exercise and nutrition website.

lender.name: Morgen
lender.whereabouts: West Pennant Hills New South Wales
lender.loan_because: I believe it is more of an incentive to live a better life then being given things. these people are setting themselves up to be able to provide for themselves. & I feel that if i can help them do that then I am doing something good.
lender.occupational_info: I set up accounts for a program that is used for managing Real Estate agents properties & contacts.

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: I think micro credit is a very powerful tool to reduce poverty and work on sustainable development. It gives people opportunities to fully deploy their own skills and talents.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working as an entrepreneur in the field of Sustainable Development.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Muhamed Yunus, founder of Grameen Bank, when he came to speak at my university about microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Public Administration. I am completing my 1st year of study in Monterrey, Mexico and my 2nd in Virginia.

lender.name: SOAR International
lender.loan_because: We care, we want to make a positive impact in this world, and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of youth that study ongoing social issues around the world. We create peace plans to help youth that are living with these various issues by raising awareness as well as funds with a goal to help improve their economic status through education and other activities. We have met with numerous Nobel laureates to learn from their wisdom and help further our work. If you'd like to learn more visit www.myspace.com/projectsoar or www.freewebs.com/soarinternational

lender.name: Dan Sellberg
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for help other companies to set up and run their computer systems and networks.

lender.name: LQS Eddie Gough Fund
lender.loan_because: Les Quennevais School has established the Eddie Gough fund as a lasting tribute to Eddie's success as charity co-ordinator for more than a decade.
lender.occupational_info: We're a friendly, cheerful and successful school serving students in the west of the island of Jersey

lender.name: Rahala
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a better life and i want to make a difference to those less fortunate than myself. "i have, therefore i give"

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the day to day management of commercial properties in a busy town centre.

lender.name: sejal
lender.loan_because: I can (!) and I'm grateful for it.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Helping people is what it is all about.
lender.occupational_info: inmates need someone to help them manage their time in and getting ready to get out. That is my job as a case manager.

lender.name: Coy
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage others to be successful with their business, and I want to extend a hand to people who may not have access to reliable financing.
lender.occupational_info: I provide complex outdoor advertising solutions to businesses in the Central Texas market. I work with local companies to help increase their exposure in Central Texas and position their brand in a way that gives them a competitive advantage.

lender.name: Ugi
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to meet up with life struggles, Some how in life, one must need a form of help or assistance from another. This is why I loan
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, it is a little bit rewarding, but My dream is to set up a company that is built on information and communication technology. I have succeeded in registering the name, but I now have to be very established.

lender.name: Alyson
lender.loan_because: I want to see people empowered and in charge of their own future.

lender.name: NC3 CG
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with much so we want to be good stewards and help others!
lender.occupational_info: We attend New Community Covenant Church and meet on a weekly basis to study the Bible. Our group is comprised of various occupations.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: of Matthew 25:31-46

lender.name: Mary Jo
lender.loan_because: It's a way to directly connect with women across the world who are striving for a better life. I like hearing the stories of hope and ambition and watching the success that a little support can bring someone and their family.
